CustomField.description: Removes the year from the event name for use on reporting.
CustomField.formula: SUBSTITUTE( IF(CONTAINS(Name,"2030"), SUBSTITUTE(Name, " 2030", ""), IF(CONTAINS(Name,"2029"), SUBSTITUTE(Name, " 2029", ""), IF(CONTAINS(Name,"2028"), SUBSTITUTE(Name, " 2028", ""), IF(CONTAINS(Name,"2027"), SUBSTITUTE(Name, " 2027", ""), IF(CONTAINS(Name,"2026"), SUBSTITUTE(Name, " 2026", ""), IF(CONTAINS(Name,"2025"), SUBSTITUTE(Name, " 2025", ""), IF(CONTAINS(Name,"2024"), SUBSTITUTE(Name, " 2024", ""), IF(CONTAINS(Name,"2023"), SUBSTITUTE(Name, " 2023", ""), IF(CONTAINS(Name,"2022"), SUBSTITUTE(Name, " 2022", ""), IF(CONTAINS(Name,"2021"), SUBSTITUTE(Name, " 2021", ""), IF(CONTAINS(Name,"2020"), SUBSTITUTE(Name, " 2020", ""), IF(CONTAINS(Name,"2019"), SUBSTITUTE(Name, " 2019", ""), IF(CONTAINS(Name,"2018"), SUBSTITUTE(Name, " 2018", ""), ""))))))))))))) , "K-12 ", "")
CustomField.label: Event Series Name
